txt.en: Kindred to the Men of Bree
You may not have been born among the Men of Bree and you may not make the small towns throughout Bree-land your home, but you are welcome wherever you go.
You must earn Kindred standing with the Men of Bree
There is nowhere you can travel within the bounds of Bree-land where you are not known. The people feel a deep kinship with you.
